17-64278 | area_total_km2 = 9.71 | area_land_km2 = 9.26 | area_water_km2 = 0.45 | population_density_km2 = 1151.51 }} Riverdale is a village and a south suburb of Chicago in Cook County, Illinois, United States. The population was 10,663 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Villages in Illinois Category:Settlements in Cook County, Illinois Category:Suburbs of Chicago
